block.p: WANDEL & GOLTERMANN MANAGEMENT HOLDING G.m.b.H, Eningen, Germany, has reached an agreement with Wavetek Corp., San Diego, to merge, combining the two makers of electronic communications equipment. The purchase price was not disclosed.
SEAGRAM CO., Montreal, said it would invest $90 million to take a majority stake in its South Korean whisky joint venture with Doosan Group, raising its share to 78 percent from 50 percent.
